attributes.action: Remove health and safety from society
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Health and safety is out of control and reduces peoples ability to think for themselves. It is preventing real education and sucks the fun out of living

rejection.details: Please clarify what you are suggesting in the title of your petition. Are you referring to Health and Safety rules or legislation?
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
